short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize your selected Text with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your reading with AI-powered summaries!
This extension uses advanced AI to condense long articles, blogs, or web pages into concise summaries, saving you time and effort. Perfect for students, professionals, or anyone who wants to get straight to the point.
